Body:
with pytest.raises(AttributeError):
    _MultiDestTransition('solid', {})
_MultiDestTransition('solid', 'liquid', depends_on='depends_on')
class Model(object):

    def depends_on(self):
        return 'turntoliquid'
model = Model()
machine = StateMachine(model=model, states=['solid', 'liquid', 'gas'],
    initial='solid')
machine.add_transition('heat', 'solid', {'turntoliquid': 'liquid',
    'turntogas': 'gas'}, depends_on='depends_on')
model.heat()
assert model.state == 'liquid'
